provenance_domain.name: HCV1 HCV3, Grazoprevir(+), Uprifosbuvir(+), Ruzasvir resistance sequence alteration detection
provenance_domain.structured_name: HCV1 HCV3 [HCV1a:taxID:31646],[HCV3a:taxID:356114] Grazoprevir(+), Uprifosbuvir(+), Ruzasvir [PubChem:126961390] resistance sequence alteration detection [SO:0001059]

review.comment: Approved by GW staff. Waiting for approval from FDA Reviewer

usability_domain: Efficacy and Safety of Grazoprevir (+) Uprifosbuvir (+) Ruzasvir (MK-3682B) (MK-5172 + MK-3682 + MK-8408) Fixed Dose Combination in Chronic HCV Participants Failing Prior Antiviral Treatment (MK-3682-021)

This is a randomized, multicenter, 2-part, open-label trial of the combination regimen of grazoprevir (GZR [MK-5172]; 100mg), uprifosbuvir (UPR [MK-3682]; 450 mg) and ruzasvir (RZR [MK-8408]; 60 mg) with and without Ribavirin (RBV) in cirrhotic (C) or non-cirrhotic (NC) participants infected with hepatitis C virus (HCV) previously failing a direct-acting antiviral regimen (DAA). The combination regimen, referred to as MK-3682B, will be administered as two fixed-dose combination (FDC) tablets, given once-daily. The study will evaluate the efficacy of MK-3682B with or without RBV as assessed by the proportion of participants achieving Sustained Virologic Response 12 weeks (SVR12) after the end of all study therapy.

tool.name: Athena-Reference Selection
tool.description: Genotyping is performed to determine the pathogen genotype-subtype in a sample and to select the best reference to be used during the first mapping step. This is needed for a proper reference-based variant calling. Reads are assigned to the different genotype-subtype reference sequences, thus enabling to calculate the number of reads that got mapped to the selected reference sequences.

prerequisite.name: HCV genotype reference sequences: multi fasta

output_uri_list.address: Genotyping result stored in SQL database-Hercules table-GT_P using several INSERT queries.

tool.name: Athena-First Mapping
tool.description: In this step the reads from FASTQ files are aligned/mapped to the selected reference by Bowtie2 software tool determined from the reference selection step (Step 1)

prerequisite.name: HCV reference sequences: individual fasta files

output_uri_list: Mapping statistics stored in SQL database-Hercules table-Athena using several INSERT queries.
A log file is generated storing all the vital information corresponding to ongoing analysis.

reference_files.name: HCV genotype reference sequences: multi fasta
